body_html:
I wanted to occupy only 5 cores out of 40, and to do this I set the session configuration as follows:

session_conf = tf.ConfigProto( intra_op_parallelism_threads=1, inter_op_parallelism_threads=1)

sess = tf.Session(config=session_conf)

Try it and if you had any problem, let me know.
body_text:
I wanted to occupy only 5 cores out of 40, and to do this I set the  session configuration as follows:
session_conf = tf.ConfigProto( intra_op_parallelism_threads=1, inter_op_parallelism_threads=1)
sess = tf.Session(config=session_conf)
Try it and if you had any problem, let me know.
body:
I wanted to occupy only 5 cores out of 40, and to do this I set the  session configuration as follows:

`session_conf = tf.ConfigProto( intra_op_parallelism_threads=1, inter_op_parallelism_threads=1)`

`sess = tf.Session(config=session_conf)`
 
 Try it and if you had any problem, let me know.
